plain:

- Dramatic (Sabrina, When a Man Loves a Woman, Schindler's List, Sleepless in Seattle, Good Will Hunting, Mrs. Miniver, The Long Walk Home)

- Adventure (Star Wars Episode IV: A New Hope, Raiders of the Lost Ark, Sting of the West, Back to the Future, October Sky)
- Historical (Apollo 13, Schindler's List, The African Queen, Chariots of Fire, Mrs. Miniver, The Long Walk Home)
- Science Fiction (Star Wars Episode IV: A New Hope, Back to the Future)
- Biographical (When a Man Loves a Woman, Good Will Hunting)
- Family (Babe, Winnie the Pooh and the Blustery Day, Mulan, Sleeping Beauty, A Bug's Life, Stuart Little)
- Religious (Apostle Peter and the Last Supper)
- Sports (Rocky, Breaking Away)
- Musical (Holiday Inn)
- Animated (Aladdin, Beauty and the Beast, A Bug's Life, Stuart Little, Sleeping Beauty)
